snippet.title: Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg has Begun!
snippet.description:
Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200330/Strategic_Mind_Blitzkrieg/

Welcome the new wargame by Starni Games - Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg. Blitzkrieg is the way!

The wargame fans all around the world will have the opportunity to enjoy the new turn-based strategy about World War II for the German perspective!
 
In this video, we present part of the in-game cinematic after the victory in the Battle of Moscow. Do not worry that this might be the ending spoiler - as this happens after the 15th operation out of 20. So, you have 5 more battles and 25-30% of all content still ahead of you. Our campaign has 20 operations, 16 historical, and 4 alternate history (including Sea Lion and Herkules). However, in some of the 16 historical ones you can get a better outcome. 

Previous games by Starni Games:
Strategic Mind: The Pacific https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific/
Panzer Strategy https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200330/Strategic_Mind_Blitzkrieg/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarniGames
Facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/PlayStrategicMind/
StarniGames site: http://starnigames.com/

#ww2, #strategy, #strategygames, #wargame, #turnbased #tactics #blitzkrieg #strategicmind #гитлер #краснаяплощадь #гитлернакраснойплощади #немецкийпараднакраснойплощади #немецкийпарад #немцынакраснойплощади #мавзолей #гитлернамавзолее #кремль
